BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation
Location: HYBRID HEARING - Council Chambers - City Hall
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Housing and Buildings

Items.Title: Oversight – Examining State Proposals for Good Cause Eviction and Reforming the 421-a Tax Exemption Program.
Items.MatterName: Oversight – Examining State Proposals for Good Cause Eviction and Reforming the 421-a Tax Exemption Program.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Housing and Buildings
Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to not renew section 421-a of the Real Property Tax Law.
Items.MatterName: Calling on the New York State Legislature to not renew section 421-a of the Real Property Tax Law.
